title: Is there any Muslim leader in congress? - Quora

response.answer_text: Rep. Keith Ellison is the first Muslim to serve in Congress. He is a natural born American citizen and a member of the progressive caucus as well as the black caucus. Considering how long there have been Muslims in this country (before the Revolution) it is surprising that it took so long to have one in Congress.

There are not hundreds but thousands of Muslim leaders in Congress. To name a few prominent ones : Ghulam Nabi Azad (Head of the upper house i.e Raj Sabha)Meem Afzal Meem (National spokesperson)Ghulam Ahmad Mir (State President J&K Congress)Prof. Saifudin Soz (Former Union minister for water resources)
